Globals
Functions
ut assert that
ut assert that(
expression test_expr,
UtMatcher matcher,
string label = ""
)

Assertion function that accepts matchers to determine successes and failures.

Returns

If the assertion passed (1) or failed (0)

Prototype
ut assert that( test expr, matcher | expected, <label> )
Parameters
test_expr
expression

value about which we are asserting

matcher
UtMatcher

does test expr satisify this matcher or expected value?

label
string

extra information about this assertion (optional)

Examples
// Without a matcher, it defaults to the ut equal to() matcher
ut assert that( Expr( 5 + 5 ), 10 );
// The above is equivalent to:
ut assert that( Expr( 5 + 5 ), ut equal to( 10 ) );
// Some matchers accept inner matchers
ut assert that( Expr( Show( 5 + 5 ) ), ut log is( ut equal to ignoring whitespace( "5 + 5 = 10;" ) ) );
Constants
ut global reporter

Redefine ut global reporter to customize how assert successes and failures are reported when using ut assert that.
